extraEffects.effect: The giant can make a lightning bolt attack against a random nearby enemy as a free action.
40 damage OR the giant can make a release the thunder attack as a free action.

attacks.name: Giant longbow
attacks.target: 2 attacks vs. nearby or far away enemies

extraEffects.effect: The giant can make a lightning bolt attack against a random enemy that is nearby the target of the longbow attack.
Half damage.

attacks.name: Release the thunder
attacks.damage: 1d10 thunder damage per building thunder point (see below)

extraEffects.effect: Half damage.

abilities.name: Building thunder
abilities.effect: Keep count of the number of times the storm giant uses its lightning bolt attack during the battle. Add that number to the escalation die to get the current building thunder value.

abilities.name: Skystep
abilities.effect: A storm giant can use its standard action to walk or run through the air, using move actions to continue.  If the storm giant makes a standard action attack, it settles back to the ground below it without falling.

abilities.name: Storm born
abilities.effect: The storm giant has resist thunder 16+ and resist lightning 16+.

extraEffects.effect: The fire boar can make a bash attack against a different target as a free action.

attacks.name: Bash
attacks.damage: The target is weakened (-4 to attacks and defences) until the end of the boar’s next turn.

abilities.name: Bestial durability
abilities.effect: When an enemy’s attack has an effect on the dire boar other than damage, the boar can roll and immediate hard save (16+); on a success, it negates that effect.

abilities.name: Last stand
abilities.effect: The board doesn’t die until it reaches -60 hp.  While at 0 hp or below but more than -60 hp, it must roll a normal save at the end of each of its turns; on a failure it dies.

abilities.name: One random dire feature
abilities.effect: Use the dire features table or add something spicy.

nastierSpecials.name: Furious streak
nastierSpecials.effect: When the dire boar can make a bash attack, if it isn’t engaged with a different enemy, as a free action it can pop free of the enemy engaged with it and mvoe to a nearby enemy to make that bash attack.
